00045     struct FileInfo {
00048         Archive* archive;
00050         String filename;
00052         String path;
00054         String basename;
00056         size_t compressedSize;
00058         size_t uncompressedSize;
00059     };
00060 
00061     typedef std::vector<FileInfo> FileInfoList;
00062     typedef SharedPtr<FileInfoList> FileInfoListPtr;
00063 
00080     class _OgreExport Archive  
00081     {
00082     protected:
00084         String mName; 
00086         String mType;
00087     public:
00088 
00089 
00092         Archive( const String& name, const String& archType )
00093             : mName(name), mType(archType) {}
00094 
00097         virtual ~Archive() {}
00098 
00100         const String& getName(void) const { return mName; }
00101 
00103         virtual bool isCaseSensitive(void) const = 0;
00104 
00112         virtual void load() = 0;
00113 
00119         virtual void unload() = 0;
00120 
00130         virtual DataStreamPtr open(const String& filename) const = 0;
00131 
00142         virtual StringVectorPtr list(bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false) = 0;
00143         
00152         virtual FileInfoListPtr listFileInfo(bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false) = 0;
00153 
00166         virtual StringVectorPtr find(const String& pattern, bool recursive = true,
00167             bool dirs = false) = 0;
00168

00171 
00182         virtual FileInfoListPtr findFileInfo(const String& pattern, 
00183             bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false) = 0;
00184
